job.title: Color Management Software Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtThe Display and Color Technologies organization in Apples Interactive Media Group is at the core of designing and implementing solutions for rendering visual media and enhancing visual experience Examples of technologies that weve developed include High Dynamic Range Video and Images Media Composition and Pro Color features such as Display PresetsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for candidates with strong engineering and mathematical intuition who are excited to solve new problems working with a team from product conception to building production quality softwareltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtSoftware development skills in C C or equivalent languagesltbrgtltbrgtSoftware debugging and optimization skillsltbrgtltbrgtComfort with describing problems using mathematicsltbrgtltbrgtInterest in visual media technologies such as high dynamic range and wide colorltbrgtltbrgt Interest in building algorithms ampamp prototypes and constructing visually compelling demosltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtIn your role as a color management software engineer you will be responsible for developing software that renders visual media and performs display color managementltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYour responsibilities will include working with GPU Pro Color Tools Media Formats and Display Hardware teamsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBSMSPhD degree in Computer Science OR Electrical Engineering OR Equivalent Degree OR Equivalent Experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtAdditional Requirementsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt Strong problem solving and communication skillsltbrgtltbrgt Ability to stay focused and prioritize your workltbrgtltbrgt Enjoy working in a collaborative environmentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200234097ltbrgtltbrgt
